en: How many days are in a year?
zh: 一年有多少天？

en: By the time we arrived the concert had ended.
zh: 我们到的时候音乐会已经结束了。

en: You should know.
zh: 你应该知道的。

en: Before I knew it, I didn't want to see you again.
zh: 不知不觉中，我不想再见到你了。

en: How much does a night cost?
zh: 住一晚多少钱？

en: Your cat is too fat.
zh: 你的猫太胖了。

en: I wrote a letter to Anna, but it came back.
zh: 我给安娜写了封信，但被退回了。

en: I wrote a letter to Anna, but it was returned to me.
zh: 我给安娜写了封信，但信被退回来了。

en: "Can I ask you a question?" "No."
zh: “能问你个问题吗？”“不行。”

en: Some countries don't recognize same-sex marriages.
zh: 有些国家不承认同性婚姻。

en: She's young and pretty.
zh: 她又年轻又漂亮。

en: My name is Marina.
zh: 我叫玛丽娜。

en: Does this kind of thing happen a lot?
zh: 这种事儿经常发生吗？

en: Wait until he's back.
zh: 等他回来再说吧。

en: I am a native speaker of British English.
zh: 我的母语是英式英语。

en: Enjoy your youth.
zh: 享受你的青春吧。

en: I see something, but I don't know what it is.
zh: 我看见个东西，但不知道是什么。

en: We have a son and a daughter.
zh: 我们有一个儿子和一个女儿。

en: I'm seriously too busy, so I can't come tonight.
zh: 我真的太忙了，所以今晚去不了。

en: What is the mystery flavour?
zh: 那个神秘口味是什么？

en: What is the secret of the flavour?
zh: 这种味道的秘诀是什么？

en: "Are you OK?" "Yes, everything's fine."
zh: “你没事吧？”“嗯，没事，一切都好。”

en: I'm looking for a good computer.
zh: 我在找一台好点的电脑。

en: I wish I was better at cooking.
zh: 要是我厨艺再好点就好了。

en: The kitchen is not clean.
zh: 厨房不干净。

en: If you apply online, it might be faster.
zh: 网上申请可能会快一点。

en: It costs €25 a metre.
zh: 一米二十五欧元。

en: It costs 25 euros a metre.
zh: 一米二十五欧元。

en: I learned to drive and got a driving licence when I was eighteen.
zh: 我十八岁时学了开车并拿到了驾照。

en: I've left my credit card at home.
zh: 我把信用卡落在家里了。

en: It's too late for you to apologize now.
zh: 你现在道歉已经太晚了。

en: It may be faster if you apply online.
zh: 网上申请的话可能会快一些。

en: Can I see a menu?
zh: 我能看看菜单吗？

en: I can give you the address if you want.
zh: 如果你需要，我可以把地址给你。

en: I want to see that picture.
zh: 我想看那张照片。

en: Who invented it?
zh: 这是谁发明的？

en: Our dishes are prepared by the finest cooks.
zh: 我们的菜都是由顶级大厨做的。

en: These are the weapons used by the ancients.
zh: 这些是古代人用的武器。

en: Tom has started dating an older woman.
zh: 汤姆开始和一个比他年纪大的女人约会了。

en: I don't like this guy.
zh: 我不喜欢这家伙。

en: Which is your favorite browser?
zh: 你最喜欢哪个浏览器？

en: Do you hear birds?
zh: 你听到鸟叫声了吗？

en: Wake me up before you go.
zh: 你走之前叫醒我。

en: Mathematics is difficult.
zh: 数学太难了。

en: How many years have you been selling cars?
zh: 你卖车卖了多少年了？

en: I said hello to him.
zh: 我跟他打了个招呼。

en: Let go of that knife! You're scaring me!
zh: 把刀放下！你吓到我了！

en: What's up with that bomb?
zh: 那个炸弹是怎么回事？

en: What are you doing with that bomb?
zh: 你拿着那个炸弹要干嘛？

en: What's that bomb for?
zh: 那个炸弹是干什么用的？

en: What are you doing with that gun? Is that real? Put it down, that's dangerous. You're freaking me out a little.
zh: 你拿那把枪干嘛？是真的吗？快放下，太危险了。你真的有点吓到我了。

en: You're breaking the rules.
zh: 你在破坏规矩。

en: By the time I was your age, I was already married.
zh: 我像你这么大的时候已经结婚了。

en: After boiling the pasta, you should drain it in a colander.
zh: 煮完意面后，你应该用滤勺把水沥干。

en: I always use a cutting board to protect my countertop and make chopping easier.
zh: 我总是用菜板，这样能保护台面，切菜也方便。

en: I use a measuring cup when baking.
zh: 我烘焙的时候会用量杯。

en: Mary really needs your help.
zh: 玛丽真的很需要你帮忙。

en: I prefer to shower in the morning.
zh: 我更喜欢早上洗澡。

en: I prefer to have a shower in the morning.
zh: 我更喜欢早上洗个澡。

en: It's ten days until my birthday.
zh: 离我生日还有十天。

en: The pay here is a joke.
zh: 这里的工资低得简直是个笑话。

en: I prefer showering in the morning.
zh: 我比较喜欢在早上洗澡。

en: Please don't raise your voice at me.
zh: 请别对我大声嚷嚷。

en: Tom has hired a car.
zh: 汤姆租了一辆车。

en: Tom has rented a car.
zh: 汤姆租了一辆车。

en: Tom has borrowed a car.
zh: 汤姆借了一辆车。

en: Tom borrowed a car.
zh: 汤姆借了一辆车。

en: How old were you when you began playing the piano?
zh: 你几岁开始学钢琴的？

en: Close all the doors and windows.
zh: 把门窗都关上。

en: In summer, it gets light earlier than in winter.
zh: 夏天天亮得比冬天早。

en: I have serious problems.
zh: 我遇到了很严重的问题。

en: She fell asleep in a chair.
zh: 她在椅子上睡着了。

en: Apologies for the continuous emails.
zh: 不好意思，一直给你发邮件。

en: I was talking about mushrooms.
zh: 我刚才在说蘑菇的事。

en: There's a car outside.
zh: 外面有一辆车。

en: Cats are animals.
zh: 猫是动物。

en: I'll treat you to a cup of coffee.
zh: 我请你喝杯咖啡。

en: That's tofu.
zh: 那是豆腐。

en: It's a small room, isn't it?
zh: 房间挺小的，是吧？

en: Want another beer?
zh: 要不要再来瓶啤酒？

en: Have you already sent Tom a Christmas card?
zh: 你已经给汤姆寄过圣诞卡了吗？

en: I have a lot of work to do before the deadline.
zh: 截止日期前我还有一堆工作要做。

en: There are many different types of flowers in the garden.
zh: 花园里有各种各样的花。

en: A lot of students struggle with math in school.
zh: 很多学生在学校数学都学得很吃力。

en: There are many books on the shelf that I have yet to read.
zh: 书架上有很多我还没读过的书。

en: There are many beautiful parks and gardens to explore in this city.
zh: 这个城市有很多漂亮的公园和花园可以去逛逛。

en: That was a very difficult exam.
zh: 那次考试特别难。

en: This kind of mushroom is poisonous.
zh: 这种蘑菇有毒。

en: The key was under the couch.
zh: 钥匙在沙发下面。

en: Where do you think the safest place is?
zh: 你觉得哪儿最安全？

en: Ugh! I lost my phone again.
zh: 唉！我手机又丢了。

en: I've lost my phone again.
zh: 我手机又不见了。

en: There are some things that I need to buy at the drugstore.
zh: 我得去药店买点东西。

en: Did you show that picture to your friend?
zh: 你把那张照片给你的朋友看了吗？

en: Did you see the news about the earthquake?
zh: 你看到关于地震的新闻了吗？

en: He said he read this book in a day.
zh: 他说他一天就看完了这本书。

en: I was wrong. Please forgive me.
zh: 我错了，原谅我吧。

en: What will all of you be doing this weekend?
zh: 你们周末都打算干什么？

en: I'm looking forward to the graduation ceremony.
zh: 我很期待毕业典礼。

en: Shall we have some tea?
zh: 咱们喝点茶吧？

en: The Giants will play the Dragons tomorrow.
zh: 巨人队明天要跟龙队比赛。

en: This chair was cheap, but it's comfortable.
zh: 这把椅子虽然便宜，但挺舒服的。

en: Even though this chair was cheap, it's very comfortable.
zh: 虽然这把椅子很便宜，但坐着非常舒服。

en: My room is small, but it's large enough for me.
zh: 我房间虽然小，但也够住了。

en: What are you plans for tomorrow?
zh: 你明天有什么打算？

en: We'll need to run some tests.
zh: 我们需要做几项检查。

en: Am I going to need surgery?
zh: 我需要做手术吗？

en: Please roll up your sleeve.
zh: 请把袖子卷起来。

en: Your temperature's a little high.
zh: 你体温有点高。

en: Your temperature's a bit high.
zh: 你体温稍微有点高。

en: Your temperature's normal.
zh: 你体温很正常。

en: You're going to need a few stitches.
zh: 你得缝几针。

en: I bumped my head.
zh: 我磕到头了。

en: I'm going to give you a shot.
zh: 我要给你打一针。

en: It hurts when I breathe.
zh: 我呼吸的时候会疼。

en: My grandson wants to be a doctor.
zh: 我孙子想当医生。

en: I hear footsteps.
zh: 我听到脚步声了。

en: There was frost on my windshield this morning.
zh: 今天早上我车的挡风玻璃上有霜。

en: I last saw him in 1945.
zh: 我最后一次见到他是1945年。
